alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:13AM CST until January 28 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Henry, Cass and Johnson MO Counties. For the Big Creek...including Blairstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Creek at Blairstown. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, The west bank of the creek begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 20.5 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 12pm 12pm 12pm Big Creek Blairstown 20.0 14.5 Wed 8am 15.2 17.9 20.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.
